Title: Relates to state reimbursements for interest on federal tax liability resulting from real property tax law changes enacted in 2018
Summary: Relates to state reimbursements for interest on federal tax liability resulting from real property tax law changes enacted in 2018.
LawCode: Amd Part EEE ยง1, Chap 59 of 2018
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part EEE of chapter 59 of the laws of 2018, relating to an online application system for taxpayers to submit claims for reimbursements of certain payments, in relation to state reimbursements for interest on federal tax liability resulting from real property tax law changes enacted in 2018
